name: CherryPick: Plant breeding simulator
description:
This was my first time doing a Web GL build. It doesn't work for me, maybe it will work for you. Who knows. There is an exe file too if it doesn't.

Left click on a flower and right click on a different flower to breed two flowers. 

The resulting flower produced will have a mix of the two parent flowers' genetics. Hover over a flower to examine their genes. 

For colour: RR = Red, Rr = Pink, rr = white. 

For height: TT or Tt = tall and tt = short. 

Water seeds with the watering can so that they can grow into plants. Each day the seeds can grow, but they will only grow if it has been watered (I set the min water level to 0.2 so they don't need so much water to grow)

Customers will give you tasks and you must place plants in the task boxes to sell them. 

You will get 3 new tasks a day, press 'Go to sleep' to start a new day. Press 'Next customer' to get a new customer (yes, I know they are just the same pink haired girl sorry I will make more later). I randomised between 3 names just so I know the task system is working and they are displaying individual customer names.

I made this for a previous game jam, ScoreSpace #14, and I wanted to develop the idea a bit more. I ended up being in a bit of a rush as I didn't have the whole month due to a holiday I took at the start of January. Also I was overly ambitious with the time I had, so naturally there are a lot of bugs. 

 There is an issue where you can't sell plants even though you have fulfilled the order criteria. I'm not sure why this is as I only encountered it today, but I will have a look.

Used https://elements.envato.com/message-pop-HCSGDAL for 'pop' sound effect

Used 100% free fonts from 1001 Fonts:

KarmaFuture font for title - Typodermic Fonts

Roses are FF0000 font for UI text -  http://ajpaglia.com/
